description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ScHEq3OLmya5h6VJ]{Arcane Recall}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Qq7mO1bizBaTvDtY]{Mass Fly}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.VGCgFolfTUswM3ib]{Time Stop}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.8Sck0JiIOGrvWwyN]{Wall of Force}
